metadata.summary: Configure LimaCharlie webhook adapters to ingest Canarytoken alerts as tripwire detection for breach discovery.
metadata.primary_use_case: Deploy honeytokens that alert via LimaCharlie when attackers interact with planted lures

extracted_apis.description: Get organization webhook URLs for constructing Canarytoken webhook endpoints
Create webhook adapter for Canarytokens via CLI

cross_refs.description: Provides foundational webhook adapter configuration concepts and generic webhook creation process
Explains cloud-based external source ingestion which Canarytokens uses as webhook mechanism
